group.label: Gallery Page Pop Up Settings-(FME GALLERY)
Thumbnail Tools
group.comment: Possible tools: 'share', 'download', 'cart', 'info', 'display'. Use comma(,) for multiple icons

group.label: Hover Effects
group.comment: Consult User guide for Catchy Hover Effects

group.label: LightBox Settings
group.comment: Use these to avail 'previousButton', 'nextButton', 'rotateLeft', 'rotateRight', 'pageCounter', 'playPauseButton', 'fullscreenButton', 'infoButton', 'linkOriginalButton', 'closeButton', 'downloadButton', 'zoomButton', 'shareButton', 'label' (image title and description),
